This beachfront hotel is a luxury resort set in Sant Salvador Beach on the Costa Daurada, just 35 minutes away from Barcelona aiport. The spacious rooms are stylishly decorated and have high ceilings, flat-screen TV’s and bathrobes. Most rooms feature side or front sea views.

The resort has 2 restaurants, serving a range of Catalan dishes and buffet cuisine. There are also pool-side, lounge and terrace bars..

The Ra Beach’s extensive spa offers hydrotherapy and sea water treatments, as well as massages. There is also a Kids' Club, offering activities and crafts specially designed for young guests to enjoy.

Location: 30 min from Barcelona Airport

Category: 5 stars

Restaurants: 4 Restaurants and 1 bar
